subject: Request for Purchase Order Number – Simsonn Pedal Plus X (AliExpress)
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Support Team,

I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out regarding my purchase
of the *Simsonn Pedal Plus X (2 Pedals, White Color without plate)* on
*AliExpress* dated *9th December 2025*.

Unfortunately, due to a factory reset caused by a software glitch on my
smartphone, I lost access to the passkey and my AliExpress account. As a
result, I am unable to retrieve the purchase order number, which I urgently
need in order to locate my account and reset my password.

Here are the details I can provide to help verify my purchase:

   - *Product:* Simsonn Pedal Plus X
   - *Purchase Date:* 9th December 2025
   - *Payment Method:* GPay linked with TrueMoney Wallet (Thailand)
   - *Proof of Payment:* I have the payment slip and receipt from TrueMoney
   - *Shipping Detail:* Lumpini Place Narathiwatratchanakarin
      - 200(473 55 Naradhiwas Rajanagarindra Rd, Chong Nonsi, Yan Nawa,
      Bangkok 10120, Unit 200/82, Building A
      - Oudom
      - +66 95 265 60 30
      - *Order Status:* I have not yet received the product. I suspect the
   delay may be related to customs or tax clearance as I remembered the
   arrival should be 25 Dec 2025.

Given these circumstances, retrieving the *Purchase Order number* from
AliExpress would be extremely helpful. It will allow me to recover my
account, resolve any customs or tax issues, and ensure successful delivery
of the product.

I kindly request your assistance in providing me with the Purchase Order
number associated with this transaction. Please let me know if you require
any further documentation or verification from my side. I am happy to
provide the payment slip, receipt, or shipping details as needed.

Thank you very much for your support and understanding. I look forward to
your reply.

Best Regards

Oudom

conversations.body_text: Ticket with ID 9362 has been merged into this ticket.

Hi oudom chanthy,  We have already replied to you online on AliExpress.
